attributes.action: Abolish Income Tax for all pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Upon reaching the age of retirement, no pensioner should have to pay income tax going forward i.e. income tax deductions cease as from the day of reaching retirement age. Having worked and contributed all their lives, this would be a means of thanking all retired persons as well as granting them special status.
